name: Cycles (Vanchyy, HyperMes)
description:
Welcome to Mei’s life, a certified pet cloning specialist! In this 2D side scroller RPG, you get to play through Mei’s days, ultimately helping her find navigate through her work and personal life. 

Credits:

Shams | Character Design& UI design& Story

Vanchyy | Programming & System Design & Consolidation

Lu |Level Design& Level Art

Mouzhen | Playtesting & Story

Jerry | Playtesting

Nafisa Farah | Musics
